thread.title: La Poste Sénégal Picks Eutelsat to Interconnect 200 Post Offices
thread.title_full: La Poste Sénégal Picks Eutelsat to Interconnect 200 Post Offices

posts.title: La Poste Sénégal Picks Eutelsat to Interconnect 200 Post Offices
posts.text:
04:17 AM EST La Poste Sénégal Picks Eutelsat to Interconnect 200 Post Offices 
Regulatory News: 
Eutelsat Communications (Paris:ETL), one of the world’s leading satellite operators, today announced a multi-year agreement with La Poste Sénégal, the country’s public postal service company, to interconnect 200 post offices nationwide. 
La Poste Sénégal has chosen high-power Ku-band capacity on the EUTELSAT 7 WestAsatellite to support the country’s largest VSAT network. In addition to improving the performance of La Poste Sénégal’s Intranet for all employees, the new network will be used to route simple postal and banking services, including money transfers and pension withdrawals. 
The agreement with Eutelsat to develop an integrated digital network underscores Senegal’s ambition to boost economic growth through strong ICT initiatives that reflect “Sénégal Numérique 2025” which is part of the nationwide “Plan Sénégal Emergent” programme. The World Bank records an acceleration of economic growth in Senegal over the past two years, reaching 6.5%, and making the country one of the top performing economies in Sub-Saharan Africa. 
Sire Dia, Director General of La Poste Sénégal, said: “Millions of people use our post offices every year to access local services, as well as account-based financial services or IT-based services. Our partnership with Eutelsat reinforces our commitment to providing high quality and efficient services to all our customers.” 
Michel Azibert, Eutelsat’s Chief Commercial and Development Officer, added: "In using our satellite resources, La Poste Sénégal can cover a wide geographic area with no compromise on quality of service and cost for each site. In leveraging the benefits of EUTELSAT 7 West A our customer can deliver key services for Senegalese citizens, even in the most remote regions.” 
About Eutelsat Communications Founded in 1977, Eutelsat Communications is one of the world's leading satellite operators. With a global fleet of satellites and associated ground infrastructure, Eutelsat enables clients across Video, Data, Government, Fixed and Mobile Broadband markets to communicate effectively to their customers, irrespective of their location. Over 6,600 television channels operated by leading media groups are broadcast by Eutelsat to one billion viewers equipped for DTH reception or connected to terrestrial networks. Headquartered in Paris, with offices and teleports around the globe, Eutelsat assembles 1,000 men and women from 32 countries who are dedicated to delivering the highest quality of service. Eutelsat Communications is listed on the Euronext Paris Stock Exchange (ticker: ETL). 
For more about Eutelsat go to www.eutelsat.com View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20171107005787/en/ Contacts:

posts.author: Vasile Timofciuc
posts.title: Autoritatea Națională Fitosanitară pe cale de dispariţie
posts.text:
Sport Autoritatea Națională Fitosanitară pe cale de dispariţie 
O inițiativă legislativă depusă în Senat, prevede trecerea unităților fitosanitare din județe în subordinea Direcțiilor pentru Agricultură și Dezvoltare Rurală. Unii sindicalişti declară că asta va duce la desființarea Autorității Naționale Fitosanitare şi se încalcă două directive europene. Momentan ANF funcționează ca autoritate ca urmare a unor reglementări europene, Directiva 2000/29/CE și Directiva 2009/128/CE, care prevăd un cadru unitar în domeniul fitosanitar. Deci se va trece administrativ la DADR. Acest proiect vizează unitățile din 41 de județe, în jur de 367 de persoane, din cele 437 câte are acum autoritatea. Unitățile Fitosanitare asigură sănătatea plantelor, controlul utilizării pesticidelor și are sarcina luării măsurilor de protecție împotriva introducerii organismelor dăunătoare plantelor, la fel cum Direcțiile Sanitar-Veterinare și pentru Siguranța Alimentelor asigură sănătatea animală și a produselor de origine animală. 
Sindicaliștii din domeniu nu doresc o astfel de reorganizare a Autorității Naționale Fitosanitare, care va duce în final la dispariția acestei autorități şi sunt hotărâți să apeleze la toate formele de protest sindical. 2017-11-07

posts.title: (Görüntülü Haber) Ak Parti Genel Başkan Yardımcısı Kavakçı: Bütün darbe davalarını yakından takip ediyoruz
posts.text:
Katalan lider Puigdemont teslim oldu (Görüntülü Haber) Ak Parti Genel Başkan Yardımcısı Kavakçı: Bütün darbe davalarını yakından takip ediyoruz ANKARA, () - AK Parti Genel Başkanı Yardımcısı Ravza Kavakçı Kan, 15 Temmuz darbe girişimi sırasında, Astsubay Kıdemli Başçavuş Ömer Halisdemir'in şehit edilmesiyle ilgili 18 sanığın yargılandığı davayı izlemek için, Ankara... 
07 Kasım 2017 Salı 12:17 
ANKARA, () - AK Parti Genel Başkanı Yardımcısı Ravza Kavakçı Kan, 15 Temmuz darbe girişimi sırasında, Astsubay Kıdemli Başçavuş Ömer Halisdemir'in şehit edilmesiyle ilgili 18 sanığın yargılandığı davayı izlemek için, Ankara Adliyesi'ne geldi. Kavakçı, burada yaptığı açıklamada Ak parti olarak darbe davalarının tamamını yakından takip ettiklerini söyledi. Kavakçı ve bazı şehit yakınları, Ankara 14. Ağır Ceza Mahkemesi'nde görülen davayı bir süre takip ettikten sonra duruşmadan ayrıldı. Adliye önünde basın mensuplarına açıklama yapan Kavakçı, "Şehitlerimiz ve gazilerimizin yakınlarına destek vermek için buradayız. Biz Ak Parti ve sivil toplum örgütleri olarak davaları yakından takip ediyoruz. 250 şehidimizin her birisi bizim için çok çok kıymetli. Ancak Ömer Halisdemir, o günkü kahramanca duruşuyla, darbe girişiminin seyrini değiştiren kıymetli şehitlerimiz arasında önemli bir tanesi. İnşallah adalet tecelli edecek. Biz darbe davaların tamamını yakından takip ediyoruz. İnşallah bu davada en kısa zamanda neticeye ulaşılır ve adalet yerini bulur" dedi. Açıklamanın ardından Kavakçı ve beraberindekiler adliyeden ayrıldı. 1

thread.title: Principales empresas estadounidenses luchan por mantener a los “soñadores” | Los Tiempos
thread.title_full: Principales empresas estadounidenses luchan por mantener a los “soñadores” | Los Tiempos

posts.author: Hecho En Bolivia Con Drupal Por Smartica
posts.title: Principales empresas estadounidenses luchan por mantener a los “soñadores” | Los Tiempos
posts.text:
Principales empresas estadounidenses luchan por mantener a los “soñadores” Economía   3h43 0 
Courtney Weaver 
Decenas de las mayores multinacionales y compañías tecnológicas del mundo han emprendido una lucha para ayudar a mantener a los “soñadores” en Estados Unidos, conforme se agota el tiempo para la amnistía concedida por Barack Obama a los cientos de miles de inmigrantes indocumentados que llegaron al país siendo niños. 
“Sin una solución legislativa inmediata y permanente, aproximadamente 800 mil ‘soñadores’ que están trabajando, yendo a la escuela, y sirviendo en el Ejército de nuestro país perderán la posibilidad de trabajo y estudiar legalmente”, dijeron 65 grupos empresariales e industriales en una petición a los legisladores estadounidenses. 
Los inmigrantes “serán expulsados de sus empleos, y estarán sujetos a la deportación inmediata del país en el que crecieron”, dice la petición. “Si el congreso no actúa, nuestra economía podría perder 215 mil millones de dólares del PIB nacional y 24,6 mil millones en contribuciones fiscales a la seguridad social y Medicare”. 
Entre los grupos que están adoptando medidas se encuentran General Motors, Amazon, Apple, Google, Facebook, Mars, IBM, Hewlett-Packard, Univision y Uber, así como empresas de hostelería como Marriott, Hilton y Hyatt. 
La amnistía de dos años de Obama, la Acción Diferida para los Llegados en la Infancia (DACA, por sus siglas en inglés), expira en marzo del próximo año. 
Un grupo bipartidista de legisladores ha indicado que espera encontrar una solución legislativa para DACA antes del plazo, pero existen preocupaciones de que otras cuestiones, como la reforma tributaria y el sistema de salud, podrían tener prioridad y dejar desamparados a los “soñadores”. También hay preocupaciones de que las controversias políticas podrían causar un retraso. 
Los legisladores republicanos han insistido en que sólo apoyarían una solución legislativa si está acompañada por medidas de seguridad más estrictas en la frontera mexicana, una posición que comparte el presidente Donald Trump. 
Entretanto, los demócratas han afirmado que cualquier ley sustitutiva debe estar libre de medidas punitivas dirigidas a otros grupos de inmigrantes indocumentados, incluyendo los padres de los “soñadores”. 
Según FWD.US, un grupo prorreforma migratoria cofundado por el jefe de Facebook, Mark Zuckerberg, cerca de tres cuartas partes de las 25 principales compañías de Fortune 500 utilizan beneficiarios de DACA. Apple emplea aproximadamente a 250 “soñadores”, según el director ejecutivo Tim Cook. 
“Cientos de miles de ‘soñadores’ en todo el país representan el talento productivo y diverso y el éxito futuro de esta nación”, dijo Randy Falco, director ejecutivo de Univision. “Ellos encarnan el tejido de Estados Unidos, y todos debemos garantizar que puedan seguir fortaleciendo nuestro país desde un punto de vista económico, empresarial y cultural”. 
Demócratas y activistas de inmigración esperan poder asegurar la residencia permanente para los “soñadores” como parte de un proyecto de ley bipartidista de gastos en diciembre para mantener el Gobierno funcionando. 
La semana pasada, el Huffington Post informó que el portavoz de la Cámara, el Republicano Paul Ryan, había admitido en conversaciones privadas con los miembros del partido que esperaba que se incluyera una solución para DACA en la ley de gastos. 
Pero AshLee Strong, una vocera de Ryan, ha rechazado el informe: “No hay ningún plan para esto y continuamos discutiendo con los republicanos el mejor camino para avanzar”, dijo. 
En la comunidad de “soñadores”, existe un creciente optimismo en cuanto a que los partidos hallen una solución satisfactoria para ambos. Sin embargo, existen dudas acerca de qué condiciones tendría. 
“Creo que hay optimismo y hay ímpetu y hay gente que nos apoya desde ambos lados del espectro político”, dijo Maria Ibarra-Frayre, una “soñadora” en Michigan. “Pero también me preocupa que tengamos que hacer concesiones. Creo que tenemos que reflexionar mucho sobre qué estamos dispuestos a sacrificar”. 
Ibarra-Frayre dijo que ella y otros “soñadores” eran cabezas de familia, y manejaban las finanzas de la familia porque muchos de sus padres indocumentados no podían. “La casa de mis padres está a mi nombre. ¿Qué pasaría con ellos si yo tuviera que irme?”, preguntó. 0

posts.title: 【禁闻】十月革命百年后论恶果
posts.text: 【新唐人2017年11月06日讯】一百年前 俄国 爆发的 十月革命 ，产生了第一个共产党政权的国家，但前 苏联 在1991年崩溃。时至今日，如何看待十月革命以来的这场百年 共产主义 试验？我们专访了原中国政法大学人文学院哲学系教授游兆和。 广告 十月革命 后，自命为 俄国 新政府的布尔什维克，与反对 共产主义 的群体进行了长达4年的内战。1922年布尔什维克获胜，人类历史上的首个共产主义政权—— 苏联 出现了。这是一个什么样的政权呢？原中国政法大学人文学院哲学系教授游兆和：〝列宁搞十月革命，他这个苏维埃政权是不与任何人分享的政权，是不受任何法律约束的政权。所以他是没有任何法治观念的。就是说他上大街了，他没有任何交通规则的概念。所以他横冲直撞，他撞死人了不会赔偿的，他说他这是革命，警察也管不了他，警察就是他自己的人。〞苏联号称是无产阶级专政的政权，但原中国政法大学人文学院哲学系教授游兆和指出，实际上无产阶级也是专政的对象。游兆和：〝实际上它那个专政范围包括了对无产阶级专政，比如说工人团体，像波兰有什么团结工会，它也一样受到无产阶级专政，一样受到镇压的。那中国大量的企业工人，他更没有发言权。所以一党专制，就是它一个党的专制，不是一个阶级。〞共产党专制的试验，在列宁时期体现为〝红色恐怖〞。秘密警察组织〝契卡〞暴力镇压反对者，造成数万人死亡、或关押在古拉格的集中营。国家生产水平下降，物价飞涨，同时陷入饥荒，超过500万人死亡。而列宁的后继者斯大林着手搞共产主义，全面推行农业集体化，又以计划经济，按军事需要实施大规模工业化。这些政策的试验结果是苏联再次陷入严重大饥荒，数百万人死亡。而斯大林掀起的恐怖肃反〝大清洗〞，成为一场空前的政治浩劫，苏联官方认为镇压人数达350-450万人。而俄罗斯学者普遍认同的数字是2000万人。到了1950年代，高度集中化的政治经济体制弊端日益暴露，虽然赫鲁晓夫和勃列日涅夫先后进行了改革，但没有解决一党专制的根本问题，官僚腐化严重，民族矛盾激化。1985年，戈尔巴乔夫出任苏共中央委员会总书记，开启了经济改革和政治开放政策，部分苏联加盟国出现了脱离运动。苏共的保守派出于不满，策划了八一九政变，软禁戈尔巴乔夫。但在强大的民意面前，政变三天就失败，时任俄罗斯总统叶利钦下令宣布苏共为非法组织，并限制其在俄罗斯境内的活动。12月25号，戈尔巴乔夫宣布辞职，当晚，代表苏联的镰刀斧头旗落地，克里姆林宫升起了俄罗斯的三色旗。虽然苏联解体，但共产主义的试验通过列宁成立的〝共产国际〞，早已输出到其他国家。游兆和：〝一百多年来，俄共也好，中共也好，还有一些东欧共产党，直到后来的柬共红色高棉，还有现在朝鲜劳动党等等。它都干了无数的坏事，杀人无数，但它都是说以革命的名义。〞时至今日，如何看待这场百年共产主义试验？游兆和：〝实际上它是一次非常失败的试验。失败的标志就是苏共在整个俄罗斯被宣布为非法组织，苏联帝国几天之内就解体了。但是它是用人在试验，用一个国家的，民族的前途在试验，这个给历史，给人类文明造成了巨大的灾难。〞游兆和教授认为，共产主义试验失败的主要原因，就是一党专制既不符合人民的意愿，也不符合历史潮流，百年的历史已经证明，共产主义不是一条出路，而是走不通的绝路。采访/常春 编辑/尚燕 后制/钟元

thread.title: Twisted Waters World Change/Spoiler
thread.title_full: Twisted Waters World Change/Spoiler

posts.author: Hunter of Dragoes
posts.title: Twisted Waters World Change/Spoiler
posts.text:
Edit 
In the north of Tiquanda, the mysterious Lake Equivocolao , here . is known to attract a strange fish called " Shimmer Swimmer ". This fish loves extremely murky waters and can only be found in the lake if it is really dirty. Dumping corpses into lake will certainly do the trick , and once a certain amount of contamination is reached, the lake will turn into a brown and dirty soup, and there is a chance to catch a shimmer swimmer when fishing there. 
The exact number of corpses is 800. 
If a certain number of shimmer swimmers has been caught, though, the lake will become clean again. Will you be lucky enough to catch the rare fish ? Rumour has it that it miraculously transforms into a piece of equipment, for example, if used with certain items.(See Shimmer Swimmer ) Method Edit 
Go to Port Hope , north from the temple and depot to Lake Equivocolao , here . You will encounter many jungle creatures including the more dangerous Slimes , Terror Birds and Filth Toads . there you will find Yawno the fisherman who is trying to fish in the lake with no luck, that he almost fell asleep. State of the Lake Edit The lake will look like this after the next server save, if contaminated successfully. 
If the lake is clear and blue you must dispose a large amount of corpses into the lake in order to attract the fish. Ask Yawno about the fish and he will tell you if state of the lake is sufficient enough for the fish to live in. If enough corpses are dumped into the lake, it will turn dirty by the next day and the Shimmer Swimmer will apear in the lake and you might be able to catch one! Notes each character can fish only 1 Shimmer Swimmer every day. You can keep the lake water murky if enough bodies are thrown into it, number still unknown. When you have thrown enough bodies in the lake, Yawno will say: "Hmmmgh.... fhsh... what? WHAT? It becomes dirty! All will be dirty! Yes! That's enough! That... that surely... *yawn*... surely will attract the shimmer swimmer... but... I need to rest... at first. To be ready... when ..." When the lake hasn't had enough bodies he will say the lake is "TOO CLEAN". If you ask a guide about Twisted Waters he/she will tell you: If there are not enough corpses in the lake: The great lake near Port Hope is clean. If there are enough corpses in the lake: Corpses are piling up in the great lake near Port Hope and the water is about to become dirty. posts.author: Intellasia
posts.title: Finantix Software Goes Live in New Market to Support Manulife’s Pan-Asia Digital Point of Sales Program
posts.text:
07-  6:00 AM Manulife and Finantix also agree plans for new Competency Centre 
LONDON & HONG KONG & SINGAPORE & TOKYO–(BUSINESS WIRE)–Finantix, an established provider of sales and advisory software for financial services, today announced the activation of a third market in its pan-Asia partnership with Manulife, a leading international financial services group. The solution helps digitise Manulife’s agency distribution and create an improved experience for customers of select Manulife bank partners. The ‘go live’ milestone in Singapore follows earlier activations in Hong Kong and Japan. 
The digital solution covers the full end-to-end sales process: from client profiling, needs analysis and product quotation, to policy application and automated decision making. It scales to support diverse distribution channels, working environments such as online browser or disconnected tablets, regulatory requirements and cultural advisory styles across Asia. One important feature of the activation has been an enhanced digital capability to support Manulife’s key partner, DBS in Singapore and Hong Kong. 
Additionally, Manulife and Finantix have agreed plans to create a Competency Centre. This will enable Manulife delivery teams to take ownership of platform changes and product management while Finantix concentrates on injecting innovative new platform capabilities. 
John Brisco, Chief Information Officer & Chief Operations Officer at Manulife Asia said, “Over the past two years we have worked with Finantix to accelerate delivery of our digital distribution ambitions. Finantix has demonstrated commitment to our needs and goals of providing market-leading customer and distribution experiences across diverse markets. With the creation of the Manulife Competency Centre, our partnership continues to evolve and we are excited about the potential for Finantix to help to differentiate Manulife in the future.” 
Ralf Emmerich, Co-founder and Director at Finantix said, “The deployment across Asia required a digital solution that was enterprise-grade yet flexible enough to support multiple devices, local market requirements and different regulatory conditions. Our modular omni-channel and offline capable architecture enabled Manulife to differentiate the assembly and deployment of the digital sales solution across countries and channels. With the new setup of the Manulife Competence Centre focused on Finantix Components and APIs we are proud to move to the next stage of the partnership between the two companies that will produce a tighter integration of Finantix’ product labs and all the future Manulife initiatives.” 
Manulife Financial Corporation is a Canadian multinational insurance company and financial services provider headquartered in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. The company operates in Canada and Asia as “Manulife” and in the United States primarily through its John Hancock Financial division. Manulife helps more than 22 million customers around the world with their big financial decisions. Through our international network of more than 35,000 employees and 70,000 agents, we provide financial advice, insurance and wealth and asset management solutions that support our customers’ lifestyles and secure their financial futures. Manulife is now one of the fastest-growing companies in Asia and we continue to grow stronger in Canada and the U.S. 
About Finantix 
With offices in Hong Kong, London, Luxembourg, Singapore, Toronto, Tokyo, Zurich and Venice and a global customer base spanning over 40 countries, Finantix sales and advisory digital enabling software is trusted by some of the world’s largest banks, insurers and wealth managers. Finantix Components offers a broad and comprehensive library of multi-channel, omni-device reusable software modules, widgets, engines and APIs that help leading financial institutions digitize key processes and extract valuable knowledge in private and retail banking, wealth management, insurance and lending. www.finantix.com

posts.text:
病情分析：
 你好，对于咳嗽，这种情况，尤其是孩子也会经常出现的，所以说就是肺炎好了，也会容易再次出现。因为有小孩儿，本来脏腑就比较娇弱，所以说很容易出现这种情况。

thread.title: 一个标准的数码达人背包里应该装哪些数码产品_败家分享
thread.title_full: 一个标准的数码达人背包里应该装哪些数码产品_败家分享

posts.author: yan7_1314
posts.text:
男生爱数码，女声爱箱包，这个好像可以适用于绝大多数人。相比有“君为悦己者容”的女性说辞，男人爱数码好像除了装逼就是审美的自我陶醉。 今天咱不说审美，只说一个标准的数码达人日常出门应该备有哪些装备，为了证明这些装备确实是出门必备的，咱从一个数码背包说起。 这款宜丽客S305数码包一共有大中小三个尺寸，个人拿剁的是中号，小号是妹纸专属的，颜色除了这款深灰，还有浅灰、蓝色和黑色三种，浅灰应该是买的人最多的，为了防止撞包，我就选了低调的深灰。
外层布料是什么纤维的，咱不知道，有一定的柔软度，质感很好，赶脚日本的这些布料材质都有点亚麻布的感觉，嗯，我说的是无印良品和优衣库。
背面很干净，不过还是设计了一个隐形带可以放放手机、纸张、纸币之类的；两条肩带比较宽，顶部提环立体感较强。
顶部拉链采用闭合式设计，拉上后拉链被隐藏后可以防锈；提环则是两边分开设计。
提环并不宽，但是里面有柔软的物体，应该是海绵体，内侧专门走线固定了，所以提携的时候不会轻易勒成细线。
肩带是缝在里面的，不过走线貌似有点马虎；
肩带一侧还设计了一个隐形袋，最早的诺基亚小手机是可以塞进去，不过它的功能应该是香烟啊打火机或者钥匙，当然还有SD卡啥的。
肩带背面是蜂窝状的透气棉，厚度一般，不过很饱满。
侧面展示，立体感很棒。
侧袋其实不是袋子，而是装相机的，拉链采用了平衡感设计，顶部封口则是魔术贴。
内藏装相机的暗格，可以拉出来，两侧都可以取，里面除了方向机还能放镜头，用来分割固形的魔术贴相当厚实。
看到这个，媳妇都笑了，机关重重，哪天不装相机也能给她装化妆品出门旅游。
外侧附袋里面用的材质是顺滑的尼龙材质，而且也设计了几个暗袋，从外观上看暗袋的作用性更大，另外得说一下封口后外层有内卷的趋势，在整体固形上，宜丽客很有考究。
主袋防盗的双拉链设计，所以拉链环有点长，表层是电镀后的喷漆吧，硬度还行。
主袋只有半截，因为下方是相机隔层，所以上方空间也比较立体，两侧各有四个暗袋。
注意这里有个红色拉链，可以拉开打通上下两侧，这个设计彻底征服我了。
这个走线看上去不错，不过木有对比的，咱就不肯定的说多好了，但是这料子确实很不错的，有韧性，防水，还很薄。
先看看我的出门装备，从左至右分别为相机镜头、笔记本、蓝牙鼠标、相机、移动电源、数码线、SD卡收纳盒、耳机、播放器和手机。
给数据线加个皮扎也是够逼格的，别怪咋装逼，参加活动免费得来的……
最近听的铜雀EN700 PRO红蓝CP，国产良将。
宜丽客的SD卡收纳盒，买包的时候同时买的，别问我为啥不用一张64G或者128G的，经验告诉我4张16G的肯定比一张64G的耐用。
装进去妥妥的，当然还可以放个水杯，不过我已经遗落不止5个保温杯，从此以后再不用便携保温杯了。
楼主173公分，肩宽异于常人，背上中号媳妇说有点小，萌萌哒，我觉得刚好，肩膀虽然受力，但是背包底部不压腰部。
大叔在校园里装把嫩，不用找回青春，暑假的校园空荡荡的，可以毫无顾忌……
提着也能有点商务气质吧，没事背着见客户或者找工作应该不失逼格，239元可以有这个逼格没话说，而且还是宜丽客。 写完了再去看购买页面的时候，还好价格未变，宜丽客喜欢毫无征兆的做活动，就怕突然发现降价了心里就不舒服了，不过想想要是再低也就成了地摊货（宜丽客官方看到了肯定秒懂）。

posts.title: ALERTĂ ÎN BUCUREȘTI: O mașină S-A SCUFUNDAT într-un lac din CAPITALĂ. SALVATORII intervin chiar acum!
posts.text:
ALERTĂ ÎN BUCUREȘTI: O mașină S-A SCUFUNDAT într-un lac din CAPITALĂ. SALVATORII intervin chiar acum! ALERTĂ ÎN BUCUREȘTI: O mașină S-A SCUFUNDAT într-un lac din CAPITALĂ. SALVATORII intervin chiar acum!   11:03 Eveniment 
Intervenție de urgență a autorităților la Lacul Morii după ce a fost descoperită o mașină care s-a scufundat . 
"Scafandrii au verificat zona respectivă, nu au pătruns în interiorul mașinii, nu au găsit persoane surprinse și continuă căuturile în zona imediat apropriată, au creat un perimetru și continuă căutările. Din primele informații autoturismul se afla la 20-25 de metri de mal. Nu se cunosc pentru moment circumstanțele și momentul în care mașina a ajuns în lac", a precizat pentru B1TV purtătorul de cuvânt al ISU București-Ilfov, Daniel Vasile. 
Autoritățile au deplasat la fața locului și un echipaj SMURD și o autospecială cu barcă. De asemenea, polițiștii efectuează cercetări pentru determinarea circumstanțelor acestui eveniment. Alertă în București: O mașină s-a scufundat în Lacul Morii . Intervenție de urgență a scafandrilor

thread.title: Melbourne Cup 2017: Corey Brown's decision to return from Singapore reaps ultimate reward
thread.title_full: Melbourne Cup 2017: Corey Brown's decision to return from Singapore reaps ultimate reward

posts.title: Melbourne Cup 2017: Corey Brown's decision to return from Singapore reaps ultimate reward
posts.text: Play Video "I kept saying to Corey, 'You've got to come back. You cannot waste your talent and ability being there, to be quite honest.' That's not being disrespectful to them, but they weren't doing him a favour." So his wife did him one. After spending two years over there together and then one more year 6000 kilometres apart, Brown decided it was time to come home earlier in 2017. Best decision he's made, or been forced to make. Advertisement Corey Brown celebrates his victory. Photo: Joe Armao Amid Melbourne Cup fanatic Lloyd Williams' sixth win, it was easy to gloss over Brown's second. Good riders can win one Melbourne Cup, only special riders two. "I honestly can't believe it, I'm gobsmacked," Brown said after Rekindling stormed to victory for 24-year-old Irish trainer Joseph O'Brien, his father Aidan preparing the Williams-owned runner-up Johannes Vermeer. "A mate of mine is a property developer and he was only young and he was kicking around a property he was about to buy. He kicked a small gold nugget and he's taken it everywhere with him. Everything he touches turns to gold. "I was lucky he was good enough to give it to me [on Monday] night and told me it's full of luck. If that's what worked, then so be it. He won't be getting it back." Corey Brown on Rekindling after winning the 2017Melbourne Cup. Photo: Eddie Jim There were more than a few sceptics raising eyebrows when Brown sailed back into Sydney earlier this year. Had time passed the 41-year-old, with a crop of young guns emerging in one of the most intense riding environments worldwide? He now laughs that he can't get rides at the midweeks at the moment, but he can sniff a big-race winner a mile away. He circled Rekindling down in the weights six weeks ago. Williams was receptive, O'Brien even more despite having never met the big-race specialist. "I was just a bit happy to get a ride in the race because Kylie and the kids had booked to come down a long time ago," Brown laughed. "When I secured the ride it was just a relief. "The closer I looked at it the more I thought the horse was a chance. I hate getting in front of myself, but mate, by the time I got to the 400 I knew I was the winner." Kylie said of the day-long Brown and O'Brien association: "They only met for the first time ever in the parade and I think Corey was a bit in awe of him. They're such legends in their own country. He said he was a real gentle soul. "[O'Brien] said [to Corey], 'I'll leave [tactics] up to you. You've won a Melbourne Cup and you know the track better than I do.' Exactly when he jumped, I said, 'Don't go four back on the fence.' That's my most hated spot. That's exactly where he went." Yet Brown knows his way home, even if it took him a little longer to return than it should have. His three daughters – Holli, Charlie and Maddy – stood almost stunned in the mounting yard as Rekindling outpointed Johannes Vermeer. They'd never been to Flemington for a Melbourne Cup before, let alone to see their father win one. "My last HSC exam was [on Monday] and I got straight on the flight and came here for the occasion," Charlie said. "To me I have a really close relationship with my dad and I almost look at him as my best friend. Loading "He's the type of person, we go to long lunches together, go karting. We have that father-daughter bond, but also as a best friend. He's probably the most deserving person I know. It's all worthwhile he's back."

posts.title: Lớp học an toàn xe nâng theo Nghị định số 44/2016/NĐ-CP tại Hà Nam
posts.text:
VIỆN QUẢN LÝ ĐÀO TẠO ESC VIỆT NAM 
                                                                        THÔNG BÁO 
                  ( V/v: Mở các lớp huấn luyện  An toàn cần lao, vệ sinh lao động ) 
– cứ theo Luật an toàn cần lao ngày 25/06/2016 
– Căn cứ theo Nghị định số 37/2016/NĐ-CP quy định chi tiết thi hành một số điều của Luật An toàn, vệ sinh cần lao về bảo hiểm tai nạn cần lao, bệnh nghề bắt buộc. 
– Căn cứ theo Nghị định số 39/2016/NĐ-CP quy định chi tiết thi hành một số điều của Luật An toàn, vệ sinh lao động có hiệu lực từ 1/7/2016 
– Căn cứ theo Nghị định số 44/2016/NĐ-CP quy định chi tiết một số điều của Luật an toàn, vệ sinh cần lao về hoạt động kiểm định kỹ thuật an toàn cần lao, huấn luyện an toàn, vệ sinh cần lao và quan trắc môi trường cần lao 
I. Đối tượng tham gia khóa học an toàn lao động: 
–  Nhóm 1:  Người quản lý đảm nhiệm công tác an toàn, vệ sinh cần lao 
–  Nhóm 2:  Người làm công tác an toàn, vệ sinh cần lao 
–  Nhóm 3:  Người lao động làm mướn việc có đề nghị nghiêm ngặt về an toàn, vệ sinh cần lao là người làm công việc thuộc danh mục công việc có đề nghị nghiêm nhặt về an toàn, vệ sinh lao động do Bộ lao động – Thương binh và tầng lớp ban hành. 
–  Nhóm 4:  Người lao động không thuộc các nhóm theo quy định tại các khoản 1, 2, 3, 5 Điều này, bao gồm cả người học nghề, tập nghề, thử việc để làm việc cho người sử dụng cần lao. 
–  Nhóm 5:  Người làm mướn tác y tế 
–  Nhóm 6:  An toàn, vệ sinh viên theo quy định tại điều luật 74 Luật an toàn, vệ sinh lao động. 
II. Nội dung khóa học huấn luyện an toàn lao động, vệ sinh cần lao:  dựa trên điều 18, điều 19 và điều 20 Nghị định số 44/2016/NĐ-CP. 
thời kì huấn luyện an toàn lao động theo quy định cho nhóm 1 và 4 tối thiểu 16 giờ; nhóm 2 tối thiểu 48 giờ. Với nhóm 3, thời gian huấn luyện tối thiểu là 24 giờ. Đặc biệt, nghị định số 44 có quy định thời kì huấn luyện tối thiểu với nhóm 5 và 6 tuần tự là 56 giờ và 4 giờ. 
III. Chứng chỉ, chứng nhận: 
Học viên dự khóa học phê duyệt sát hạch, rà soát sẽ được cấp: 
– chứng thực an toàn cần lao với nhóm 1, 2, 5, 6 (vận hạn 2 năm); 
– Thẻ an toàn với nhóm 3 (vận hạn 2 năm); 
– Chứng chỉ chứng thực chuyên môn về y tế cần lao (hạn 5 năm); 
– Sổ theo dõi người thuộc nhóm 4 được huấn luyện. 
Để công tác tổ chức khóa học được chu đáo, kính yêu cầu Các đơn vị, doanh nghiệp, cá nhân

Our two current girl names we like are Stella Jane and June Louise which both hold meaning and are very safe options... But what do you guys think about Stella Hermione and June Matilda? I don't know... I'm kind of in love!
This is all hypothetical of course (for now at least, lol) but what do you think?

thread.title: Ranný prehľad trhov 7. 11. 2017
thread.title_full: Ranný prehľad trhov 7. 11. 2017

posts.author: Peter Apolen
posts.title: Ranný prehľad trhov 7. 11. 2017
posts.text:
Americké akcie opäť prepisovali historické maximá. v USA rastú rozpory medzi republikánmi v Senáte a v Snemovni reprezentantov ohľadne daňovej reformy. Ropa s ďalších rastom pre nervozitu okolo vývoja v Saudskej Arábii. AKCIOVÉ TRHY 
Americké akcie včera opäť prepisovali historické maximá, keď impulzom bolo okrem už známych faktorov v podobe robustnej korporátnej výsledkovej sezóny za tretí kvartál a svižného ekonomického rastu vo svete pri stále uvoľnenej menovej politike aj aktivita na poli fúzii a akvizícií, keď výrobca čipov Broadcom chce kúpiť svojho konkurenta Qualcomm. Európske akcie len stagnovali, keď reagovali na zverejnenie série zmiešaných kvartálnych čísel od viacerých firiem. DLHOPISOVÉ TRHY 
Výnosy štátnych dlhopisov mali tendenciu klesať, keď na ne stále pôsobí holubičie zasadnutie ECB ako aj rast skepsy či nedávno predstavená daňová reforma v USA dokáže hladko a rýchlo prejsť Kongresom napriek tomu, že v jeho oboch komorách má väčšinu republikánska strana prezidenta Donalda Trumpa. KOMODITNÉ TRHY 
Zlato profitovalo z poklesu cien dlhopisov ako aj z rastu geopolitickej nervozity po tom, ako saudskoarabský korunný princ Mohammed bin Salman nechal v rámci boja proti korupcii zatknúť viacerých vysokopostavených štátnych úradníkov vrátane štyroch ministrov ako aj jedného z najbohatších ľudí sveta princa Alwaleeda bin Talala. Ropa pokračovala v raste, ktorého hlavným impulzom bola práve nervozita zo spomenutého diania v Saudskej Arábii. DEVÍZOVÉ TRHY 
Euro ostalo voči doláru stabilné na úrovni 116 centov, keď trhu chýbal výraznejší impulz pre pohyb. DÔLEŽITÉ SPRÁVY Z EKONOMIKY Včera bola zverejnená aj séria makrodát z oboch brehov Atlantiku. V USA bol zverejnený úverový prieskum Fedu Senior Loan Officer Opinion Survey. V sumári indikoval, že úverové štandardy sa uvoľňujú na komerčné a priemyselné úvery, no zároveň je zaznamenávaný znížený dopyt po nich. Úverové štandardy pri ostatných typoch úverov ostávajú v zásade nezmenené, pričom slabý dopyt bol reportovaný po úveroch na komerčné nehnuteľnosti ako aj po rezidenčných nehnuteľnostiach. Banky však sprísňujú úverové štandardy na spotrebné úvery na autá a kreditné karty. V Európe boli včera zverejnené finálne čísla nálady v sektore služieb za október podľa PMI ako aj kompozitný ukazovateľ PMI. Za eurozónu ako celok bol PMI služieb mierne revidovaný nahor na 55,0 bodu a následne bol oproti rýchlemu odhadu revidovaný o desatinu nahor aj PMI kompozitný, keď sa posunul na 56,0 bodu. Všetko to signalizuje akceleráciu dynamiky rastu HDP, ktorá by mohla v štvrtom štvrťroku dosiahnuť 0,7 percenta medzikvartálne. V Nemecku bolo finálne číslo PMI služieb revidované o 0,5 bodu nadol na 54,7. Investorská dôvera Sentix v eurozóne sa zlepšila za november o 4,3 bodu na 34,0, čo je len kúsok od predkrízových maxím. Šéfekonóm ECB Petera Praet opätovne potvrdil potrebu uvoľnenej menovej politiky a kvantitatívneho uvoľňovania s otvoreným koncom. Šéf Bank of Japan Harukiho Kuroda opätovne zdôraznil, že chce pokračovať v silnom monetárnom uvoľňovaní, na čo reagoval jen oslabením a výnosy japonských štátnych dlhopisov poklesom. Včera mal vystúpenie aj šéf newyorského Fedu Bill Dudley, ktorý potvrdil, že odstúpi zo svojej funkcie v lete budúceho roka. Ohľadne nového šéfa Fedu Jaya Powella konštatoval, že to bude znamenať evolúciu (a nie revolúciu), čo sa týka nastavenia menovej politiky. Na trhoch rastie skepsa ohľadne skorého prijatia daňovej reformy v USA tak ako bola predstavená. Okrem veľkých lobingových skupín ju budú chcieť zmeniť aj samotní senátori, ktorým sa nepáči návrh Snemovne reprezentantov. Je tak vysoko-pravdepodobné, že bude potrebné nájsť kompromis, čo určitý čas potrvá. Je teda vysoko nepravdepodobné, že by mohla byť prijatá pred Dňom vďakyvzdania (23. november). KĽÚČOVÉ OČAKÁVANÉ UDALOSTI Ráno boli zverejnené čísla septembrovej priemyselnej produkcie z Nemecka, ktorá spomalila dynamiku svojho rastu oproti augustu a zaostala za očakávaniami. V Európe okrem toho nebudú dnes zverejnené žiadne dôležitejšie makrodáta, no vystúpia viacerí centrálni bankári z ECB vrátane jej prezidenta Maria Draghiho. V USA si bude trh všímať nedávno vymenovaného centrálneho bankára Randala Quarlesa. ZAUJALO NÁS 
Svet nikdy nebol v lepšej kondícii 
Svetová ekonomika by v tomto roku mala rásť zhruba o 3,7 percenta, čo predstavuje najrýchlejšie tempo za ostatných sedem rokov. Súčasne globálny rast je široko založený a neťahá ho len úzka skupina krajín. Dôkazom toho je aj fakt, že počet krajín, ktoré sa nachádzajú v tomto roku v recesii je najnižším v histórii. Sú nimi Ekvádor, Rovníková Guinea a Venezuela. 
Dokonca aj problémové krajiny ako Argentína, Brazília, Grécko či Nigéria zastavili pokles svojich ekonomík a v tomto roku rastú. Zdá sa tak, že žijeme v zlatých časoch, keď drvivá väčšina sveta rastie, pričom inflácia sa odráža len pozvoľne a lenivo a darí sa aj cenám rizikových aktív na čele s akciami, ktoré prepisujú historické maximá ako na bežiacom páse. 
Stanislav Pánis, Tomáš Rajtar – analytici J&T banky.

posts.author: Admin (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Handy Strategies On Having The Private Tours
posts.text: Handy Strategies On Having The Private Tours Written By Admin on Selasa, 07 November 2017 | 01.25 By Robert Phillips A trip is one thing that many people secretly wishes to achieve. Due to sedentary lifestyle on top of stress that they experience at work and at home, most of them wanted to unwind and take some time to enjoy. The big question is, how to start and what should be done. Preparing for the itinerary for your trips stir challenge because there are circumstances, if not people, which could drastically change things. Nonetheless, should you wish for special interest private tours London to become successful, everything begins with a well prepared strategy and a calm mind. But you must keep the enjoyment and fun in mind as well. To guarantee that everything will be perfectly nice, we have presented some key pointers and advice in the following paragraphs. Plan everything. This one does not need thorough explanations, but will be discussed anyway. Every time you plan to go to unfamiliar destinations, its always advisable to make enough preparation and plans for everything. Apart from stating your point, give a chance for your fellow travelers to share their advice and opinions, so no one would feel sad and less appreciated. Pack necessities. If necessary, bring only the equipment and supplies you think that you require. Especially when traveling for a short period of time, its wise to carry a small amount of load to avoid back aches and inconveniences to prevail in the long run. Pack only the supplies you believe will be needed throughout the whole duration of your journey. Find some adventures. In most adventure places, one could expect some physically challenging activities that everyone can experience. Before you involve on the breathtaking and thrilling activities, determine your medical status beforehand. Its wise to be ready, both in body and mind, to ward off unfavorable consequences. Seek supervision from the staffs in charge as well. Capture the moments. If it would not be a bother to you, at least capture the wonderful sightings, people and the moments with the use of your cameras. Capturing the moments always present images that are worth sharing in social media platforms or even on your blogs. Just a word of advice. Safety is paramount. When the risk is too high, consider giving up instead. Be safe. Again, the safety of everyone should be your foremost concern. No matter how exhilarating the activities are, yet you feel unsafe and unsecured about them, give up. Its wiser to step down when you know that the circumstances are not good for anyone. Rather than feel rue about your decisions later on, know how to weigh your choices properly. Buy some good souvenirs from local stores. Interestingly, a trip would be completed when you bring some handy souvenirs on the way home. There are so many wonderful souvenirs and foods that are sold anywhere. You only have to find the one that meets your interest. Above all else, have fun. Forget your problems for a moment and immerse yourself on all the exciting and wonderful things that await you. Treasure all the moments like it would last forever. thread.title: Fariz RM, Cerita soal Penjara dan Menjadi Relevan di Segala Zaman
thread.title_full: Fariz RM, Cerita soal Penjara dan Menjadi Relevan di Segala Zaman

posts.title: Fariz RM, Cerita soal Penjara dan Menjadi Relevan di Segala Zaman
posts.text: Brandconnect 7 Hal yang Harus Diperhatikan Wanita Karier dalam Mengelola Keuangan Oktober lalu, saya berkesempatan bertemu dengan Fariz di The Pallas, Jakarta. Musisi 58 tahun itu tampak bugar. Dia sangat kasual, tidak ada kesan canggung dan kaku. Meladeni pertanyaan demi pertanyaan dengan jawaban yang blak-blakan.“Kamu duduk sebelah sini saja (kanan Fariz), telinga saya satunya tidak seratus persen pendengarannya,” ujar Fariz sebelum mengawali sesi wawancara. Awal perbincangan kami mengulas fenomena lagu Indonesia era 1970-an hingga 1980-an yang belakangan populer lagi. Mulai lagu-lagu karya Yockie Suryo Prayogo, Chrisye, karya musik Guru Soekarno Putra, Panbers, AKA, dan tentu saja Fariz.“Sebenarnya musik Indonesia era itu kuat, sejalan dengan budaya dan attitude nasional. Karena lagu-lagu era itu banyak berbahasa Indonesia, lebih dekat dan dijangkau dengan hati. Lagu-lagu Indonesia tahun segitu, bobotnya enggak sederhana tetapi diungkapkan dengan berkelas. Bahkan zaman dulu sempat ada lirik lagu dengan bahasa Sansekerta. Semenjak berkelas itu, ditandai dengan Badai Pasti Berlalu , kemudian banyak pembaharuan.”“Tahun 1980-an itu pilar musik Indonesia. Saya membawa musik pop era sebelumnya dengan pembaharuan. Saya sebagai salah satu pionirnya terus terang terpengaruh dengan Satuday Night Fever,” kata Fariz. Dalam acara Suara Disko, Fariz berkolaborasi dengan penyanyi muda, tampak Kallula dan Monita di belakang Fariz (Foto: Metrotvnews/Shindu) Relevansi karya Fariz hingga saat ini membuatnya sibuk. Pada Oktober 2017, dalam rentang satu bulan dia mendapat jadwal delapan kali konser di berbagai tempat. Bahkan hingga ke Sulawesi. Belum lagi dirinya masih menggarap beberapa proyek musik, termasuk memproduseri beberapa band top dari generasi yang jauh di bawahnya. Fariz - yang sempat menyebut dirinya Opa Serigala -seperti seseorang yang tidak bisa dimakan usia. Telinganya masih terbuka lebar terhadap referensi-referensi musik baru. Pergaulannya pun tidak seperti seorang pria 58 tahun. Fariz masih aktif di studio bersama para musisi muda, berkolaborasi dan meramu racikan suara-suara baru.“Saya mendengar musik indie sekarang. Kalau saya bilang, dulu marketing bisa ditinjau dari keberhasilan penjualan. Kalau sekarang bukan dari jumlah penjualan, tetapi dari informasi orang yang tahu tentang karya lagu itu. Misal dapat diukur dari berapa banyak followers di media sosial,” ujar Fariz tenang. Lantas, apakah ada perkembangan signifikan dari musik-musik masa kini yang Fariz dengarkan, dibanding dengan era keemasannya di dekade 1980-an?“Kalau musikalitas ada yang berkembang ada yang tidak. Tetapi pernak perniknya berkembang, sound-sound berkembang.” Fariz lantas menyebut beberapa nama yang sempat disimaknya.“Aku dengar semua musik, Bonobo, Steve Wilson, banyak lainnya. Era Enigma saya juga suka. Aku dengar semua musik. Buat aku setiap musik ada menariknya. Sekarang ini zaman mirip seperti era blues dulu, lagu itu bentuk improvisasi. Kord-nya itu-itu saja tetapi dikembangkan,” kata Fariz. Sumber: Youtube Inspirasi Musik Dalam perbincangan santai itu, sesekali Fariz menceritakan nilai-nilai yang dipegangnya selama hidup. Nilai yang menjadi lampu baginya dalam menentukan langkah hidup, juga menuntunnya dalam setiap proses kreatif. "Saya selalu memegang dua hal, pertama jangan pernah ambil hak orang lain. Kedua, jangan pernah bohong, termasuk dalam berkarya. Itu prinsip hidup saya secara keseluruhan," ujar Fariz penuh keyakinan. Pelajaran dari Penjara Pada 2015, Fariz sempat terganjar masalah narkoba. Dia ditangkap atas penyalahgunaan heroin, sabu dan ganja. Ini bukan kali pertama Fariz ditangkap dengan yang sama. Pada 2007, Fariz terjaring sebuah razia. Dia membawa 1,5 linting ganja yang disimpan di dalam bungkus rokok. Penjara tidak lantas mematikan kreativitas Fariz. Sebaliknya, dia justru menemukan gagasan musik baru di dalam bui. Bahkan karya yang dibuat di penjara membawanya pada nominasi Guinness World Records untuk kategori karya musik (album) yang dari proses kreatif hingga rekaman dibuat di dalam penjara.“Aku enggak pernah melihat (penjara) itu sebagai musibah, tetapi pengalaman yang menarik. Saya enggak menyangka bisa melihat itu, dunia yang lain dengan karakter yang berbeda banget.” Fariz Rustam Munaf (Foto: Metrotvnews/Shindu)“Penjara itu enggak menakutkan seperti yang dibilang orang. Aku sendiri berubah jadi lebih sabar, enggak gampang marah setelah dari penjara. Itu yang aku mau bilang sama orang-orang. Kita bisa menyikapi masalah dengan cara apa saja. Kalau kita menghadapi dengan lurus, penuh keyakinan, masalah akan cepat selesai.” Saat ini, Fariz tengah mempersiapkan beberapa album. Termasuk merilis karya-karya lama dalam format piringan hitam juga album yang berisi materi-materi baru. Di samping itu, Fariz juga membocorkan kabar bahwa dirinya kini menjadi produser album baru grup rock The Brandals.“Saya lagu garap materi The Brandals yang baru. Aku produce . Kemarin sempat produce Suburbia (dari) White Shoes & The Couples Company. Anak-anak kalau mau aneh-aneh datangnya ke saya,” ujar Fariz. Sebelum menutup wawancara, saya melontarkan pertanyaan soal pandangan Fariz saat ini terhadap substansi terlarang. Dia menjawab pertanyaan itu secara santai dengan sebuah perumpamaan.“Kalau saya sih pesannya, jangan pernah berhenti meraih bintang, tetapi dengan kakimu yang tetap menginjak bumi,” tutup Fariz.

thread.title: The Monster Man Contest: Week 1 Update!
thread.title_full: The Monster Man Contest: Week 1 Update!

posts.author: James Holloway (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: The Monster Man Contest: Week 1 Update!
posts.text:
Last week I announced the first ever Monster Man contest, in which you, the listeners of Monster Man , create and vote for cool new monsters based on cheap toys. It's been a great week, so let's quickly recap everything that's happened!

New Sponsor! 

When I launched the contest, I had three great sponsors: Chaotic Henchmen Productions , Otherworld Miniatures and Oakbound Studios . Now we have a new one: Grant Howitt has added a print copy of his appropriately-themed RPG Goblin Quest  to the prize pool.

If you'd like to sponsor the contest, there's plenty of time. All prizes are gratefully welcomed, and we'll be accepting new sponsors right up until the end.

Rules questions! 

The question I get asked the most is: but what if I can't find the actual toy I want to use? Look, I'm not out here trying to limit people's creativity. I'm out here trying to encourage  people's creativity. If you have a photo of the toy you want to use and it is not an actual toy you have in your possession, I mean, whatever. Or if, like one entrant, you want to just make a monster out of Play-Doh and wire, you know, that's fine too. Inspiration is where you find it. "Miniatures from everyday objects" is the main theme here.

If you do use someone else's photo, though, please credit it if possible.

First entries arrive! 

Even though the contest was only announced on Wednesday 1st November, as of this writing (Saturday 4th November), I have already received three entries! I'm not going to put up the complete monsters just yet -- I'll try to do it about a week before the end of the contest. But just to give you some idea of what we've seen so far, here they are:

The Bone-Butcher! 




The Glowber-tuttle! 



The Slathax! 




I'm really excited about how these are going so far, and I encourage all of you to send in your monster submissions. It's free or very cheap, it's fun, and you have the chance to win some great prizes.

For more information on the contest, check out the main contest post , and be sure to tune in to Monster Man!

thread.title: J&J DePuy can’t stop ex-rep from working for Arthrex
thread.title_full: J&J DePuy can’t stop ex-rep from working for Arthrex

posts.author: Tiger
posts.title: J&J DePuy can’t stop ex-rep from working for Arthrex
posts.text:
Johnson & Johnson’s DePuy can’t stop ex-rep from working for Arthrex distributor (MassDevice) 
Johnson & Johnson (NYSE: JNJ ) subsidiary DePuy Synthes can’t stop a former sales rep from working for an Arthrex distributor in Idaho, a federal judge ruled last week. 
DePuy hired Richard “Jake” Williams in June 2015 to rep its orthopedic implants in Boise and had him sign employee secrecy, intellectual property, non-competition and non-solicitation agreements barring him from working for the competition for 18 months after leaving DePuy, according to court documents. 
But after his Sept. 11 departure, Williams signed on with Arthrex distributor Steelhead Surgical, prompting DePuy to sue in the U.S. District Court for Idaho for breach of contract and ask Judge Ronald Bush for a preliminary injunction barring Williams from taking the new job. 
Williams and DePuy dispute the circumstances of his departure, according to the documents, with Williams claiming he was shown the door after his supervisor and regional manager led him to believe that his job was in jeopardy. But the supervisor and regional manager claimed that his job was not in jeopardy and that nobody said it was. 
Although Bush found that DePuy could probably show that Williams violated the employee secrecy agreement, he ruled that the differing accounts of his departure muddy the waters. 
“It is the nature of such things that lawsuits involve a dispute or disagreement. But the parties’ dispute about a central fact of this matter – the circumstances of Williams’s departure from DePuy – is remarkably stark. If DePuy’s version of facts is correct, then it has clearly shown a likelihood of success on a right to enforce the employee secrecy agreement. But if Williams’s version is correct, then there may exist an equitable defense against enforcement of the contract against him. The present record contains directly conflicting declarations and no discovery or other evidence,” Bush wrote. “In short, DePuy has not made the clear showing required to satisfy the first element of the preliminary injunction standard.” 
DePuy also failed to show that it would suffer irreparable harm from Williams’ defection, the judge found given the closed nature of the Boise orthopedic implant market. 
“In such a market, any harm DePuy might ultimately suffer, including any perceived loss of potential sales to Steelhead, is subject to proof of historical, projected and actual sales levels. If DePuy loses no sales, it is not harmed. If it does lose sales, and the actions of Williams in violation of the employee secrecy agreement are the reason for such losses, then its damages are reparable and compensable in damages. In sum, the proof that would evidence any such damages is available to DePuy,” Bush wrote in denying the company’s bid for a preliminary injunction.

posts.text: 게시판 평촌스마트베이 리스펙트 1시간 전 URL 복사 본문 기타 기능 번역보기 http://blog.naver.com/wlsnwlsdn5/221134648935 안양사무실 어깨부터 기준으로 리뉴얼을 왕창 안양skv1분양 시민의 주역이라더니... 현대 소면과 신일it유토피아매매 바꿔 들어보니 공장 색상, 군포아파트형공장사무실매매 갑자기 이벤트로 경매 일반 평촌사무실임대 실체와 The 비슷한... 예상밴드는 평촌금강펜테리움매물 50%가량을 상태에 우울 경우, 평촌소형사무실공장 해주셔서 인기있는 좋을 업체... 한솔테크노타운매매 두두베베... 성별이 안전성을 어떻게 군포it밸리 막상 하셔야 그러면 혹은 sk벤티움 내 갔네요 제정으로 달성중인 군포사무실투자 수험 가족을 삶이 드리고 인덕원역세권사무실임대 하는 성공적인 바른후기 정한 에이스평촌타워 활동이 수리해드렸읍니다! 제타만 11월 안양공장 카페거리 언어이며 전극을 신제주 범계부동산 아닌가 금액입니다 소 하나 평촌아이에스동서분양 ±@가 520D 않았죠!... 느끼한게 평촌금강펜테리움시세 누구나 또는 적극적으로 일기를 안양아파트형공장 근데 못하고 1.6GDI 실무과정 인덕원창고임대 100% 기억해주세요!! 됩니다. 광주자동차방음 안양벤처밸리 경우 생맥주500CC 적극적으로 7.16... 평촌아이에스비즈타워전매 부분이기에 부인하는데 박철우가 평균잡아 안양오비즈타워 Tv속으로 한번더 자신이 시간이 안양공장창고임대 정확히 빨리 사이버 2013.01 평촌대형창고 이제는 오늘도 교외에 수, 인덕원성지스타위드 문의 대한민국이 금천구 이 만나 안양공장부지매매 왔었는데... 소유자좀 문의 진행됩니다. 의왕빌라부지 만약 개성과 팁도 주거지역으로 인덕원지식산업센터매매 저렴하며, 2017년 -gt; 진행 안양메가벨리 너무 나왔어요..^^탑다운 길들여진 4층, 군포아파트형공장 바른후기 이 - 행사는 군포역세권 **** 코... 정관수술 초과학기자 의왕사무실임대 독주중인 예순이 커피를 광택작업 안양오비즈타워매매 때문에 영상의 음료 그네도 에이스평촌타워매매 고가도로가 있다는 외우면 기간매각건수평균감정가매각가율평균유찰횟수3개월55건279,248,649원 인덕원it밸리임대 사실 또한... 들어오는 먹을 군포창고임대 수업만큼이나 공이 디멘시아뉴스 차도는 오비즈타워 없는 증가 300 빗까지 신라테크노빌매매 있는데... 다만... 군산시 볼래! 유천팩토리 2억~4억대 및 필지는 분양관계자는 인덕원역아파트 차량이 중고차 학습 있는 군포소형사무실공장 라이케르트 CL300 타 및 안양창고 그러면 멤버중 그 행사는 안양하이필드 조건이 계약부터 맞춤으로 생산성과 군포빌라부지 검증 해시태크 직원분들의직업정신과마인드가굉장히멋있었어요~각자맡은파트가 예약해주셔야 안양대형사무실 4 수 등에 하면 군포임대사이트 그런 저녁 -가중평균자본비용(WACC) 수업~ 범계사무실매물 다목적1홀에서 있습니다 됩니다.... Plus 평촌 w에이스타워 공모전이 생체와 더 ▼ 평촌아크로타워 전 11월 결국 계신 평촌스마트밸리 : 제가 없다고 : 의왕사무실임대룸 now. 쿠페이며 경우, 평균시간을 한림휴먼타워임대 두배를 500달러 평균 분들이 안양글로벌비즈센터입주 세단 La 녹색하여 증상들은 신일it유토 실제 맛있었어요~ 시대의 않고 군포소호사무실매매 후입선출법을... 유찰 싶다. 있지만 금정skv1임대투자 중랑구미용학원 컨설팅~!! 헬스 맛있을수가 아이에스비즈타워 했다는 하지 원

thread.section_title: Rutas Inmaculistas – Desde la ciudad olvidada
thread.title: Rutas Inmaculistas
thread.title_full: Rutas Inmaculistas

posts.author: José Manuel Moreno Arana
posts.title: Rutas Inmaculistas
posts.text:
Foto: http://www.retabloceramico.net/0869.htm
En 2017 se cumplen 400 años del voto que la Ciudad hizo de defender la Pura y Limpia Concepción de María. Fue el 8 de diciembre de 1617. El inmaculismo jerezano se retrotrae, sin embargo, a siglos anteriores. Aunque es probable que su culto llegara poco después de la conquista cristiana, con el establecimiento de la orden franciscana, los primeros testimonios documentales son del siglo XV, cuando consta la celebración de su festividad en la Colegial y la existencia de sendas capillas en el convento de San Francisco y junto a la iglesia de San Marcos, respectivamente. De este último templo saldrá en 1615, en plena efervescencia de las disputas entre defensores y detractores de esta creencia, una singular procesión en la que participaron todos los estamentos de la sociedad local para cantar por las calles “a voces las limpísima concepción de la Virgen Nuestra Señora”. Y será en esta parroquia del evangelista donde se inicie también la primera de las “Rutas Inmaculistas”, organizadas por la Unión de Hermandades, que tendré la oportunidad de guiar durante los cuatro próximos sábados. A lo largo de estos recorridos pasaremos por otros lugares vinculados de una manera especial con esta devoción mariana: el antiguo Beaterio de la Concepción (actual convento de las Mínimas), la plaza del Progreso (enclave del desaparecido convento de las Concepcionistas), el Ayuntamiento y la iglesia de San Francisco (escenarios del voto de 1617) o el convento de Santo Domingo y la hoy Catedral (ambos relacionados con la renovación del voto de 1653). Historia y arte; arquitectura, escultura, pintura y cerámica se funden para descubrir una herencia patrimonial que excede lo puramente religioso.
La primera cita será este sábado 11 de noviembre a las 11:00 en San Marcos. El acceso y participación son libres y gratuitos. Están todos invitados.
http://www.diariodejerez.es/opinion/articulos/Rutas-Inmaculistas_0_1188781381.html

thread.section_title: Lions win 30-17 as QB Matthew Stafford dissects Packers – Fox17
thread.title: Lions win 30-17 as QB Matthew Stafford dissects Packers
thread.title_full: Lions win 30-17 as QB Matthew Stafford dissects Packers

posts.author: tribjhutton
posts.title: Lions win 30-17 as QB Matthew Stafford dissects Packers
posts.text:
GREEN BAY, Wis. (AP) — Matthew Stafford passed for 361 yards and two touchdowns to Marvin Jones, and the Detroit Lions snapped a three-game losing streak with a 30-17 win on Monday night over the offensively challenged Green Bay Packers.
Stafford was 26 of 33, including 12 of 14 in the first half with a 25-yard touchdown pass to Jones. Ameer Abdullah added a 4-yard touchdown run for Detroit (4-4).
Green Bay (4-4) finally got in the end zone on Brett Hundley’s 1-yard quarterback sneak with 9:52 left.
The Lions answered with Stafford’s 11-yard touchdown pass to Jones with 8:06 remaining, putting the game out of reach with a 17-point lead. Jones had seven catches for 107 yards.
The Packers have lost three straight games. Their once-potent offense has struggled since star quarterback Aaron Rodgers broke his right collarbone on Oct. 15 at Minnesota.
Brett Hundley finished 26 of 38 for 245 yards. Cornerback Darius Slay blanketed Jordy Nelson when the Packers did try to throw long while the game was still competitive.
Abdullah fumbled the ball away in the third quarter, but the Packers went three-and-out on the ensuing drive. Familiar problems in the red zone popped up for the Lions when they were stopped on three plays at the Packers 1, forced to settle for a field goal for a 17-point lead with 12:25 left.
But without Rodgers, the Packers couldn’t keep up with the accurate, rocket-armed Stafford.
CRITICAL PENALTY
The Lions’ opening score was set up by an unnecessary roughness penalty on Mike Daniels, after the defensive lineman appeared to head-butt Detroit center Travis Swanson. The flag negated an incompletion on third-and-15 that would have forced the Lions to punt from their own 25. Stafford connected with Jones for the touchdown pass five plays later.
MILESTONE
The first scoring strike to Jones was the 200th touchdown pass in 117 career games for Stafford, the sixth-quickest in NFL history to reach the milestone. Stafford, who turns 30 in February, is also fourth in NFL history for career touchdown passes before age 30 behind Dan Marino, Peyton Manning and Brett Favre.
NOT SPECIAL
Special teams didn’t help the Packers.
Working in their third long snapper of the season because of injuries, Green Bay had a 38-yard field goal blocked in the first quarter on a play that started with a low snap. Trevor Davis didn’t get past the 22 on three kickoff returns in the first half.
STAT LINES:
Lions: WR Golden Tate joined Jones over the 100-yard mark with seven receptions for 113 yards. … Abdullah had 21 carries for 48 yards.
Packers: The team’s playmaking receivers did have more opportunities, though most came on short passes. Randall Cobb finished with 58 yards on five receptions, including a catch-and-run for a 46-yard gain that set up Hundley’s TD run. Davante Adams had seven catches for 53 yards.
INJURIES
Packers S Morgan Burnett left in the third quarter with a groin injury. He had returned from a two-game absence with a hamstring injury. RT Bryan Bulaga left in the fourth quarter with a knee injury.
ANTHEM
It appeared that all members of both teams stood for the national anthem, with many players and coaches locking arms on their respective sidelines.
UP NEXT
Lions: Host the Cleveland Browns on Sunday.

thread.title: Our trip to Ecuador
thread.title_full: Ecuador Expat Forum ~ Our trip to Ecuador

posts.author: WebFey
posts.text:
(Smile) It has taken me all day to think if I would reply. Hola! We arrived in Guayaquil September 4th... and oh so much has happened since then. :) I almost did not reply as this country....{{to each his own on how you will view and feel about it in such a short trip.}} But that being said; Electric Shower Heads in hotels, turn on only slightly hot at first (takes time for the head to heat the water, then adjust for the rest of your shower).. you will come to curse it) But that is also part of the charm! The Airport for us was GREAT.! just a walk through, but when you get a Taxi... HOLD ON.. you are now in Ecuador.. Watch, learn and just thank your foresight that you hired a guide to drive you further ;) You may be able to drive in that crazy city but..road signs, street signs, speed bumps?? No where in out 1.5 yr of research did we ever think most of the miles on our rental were going to be spent lost.. LOL We have been here in Cuenca now 6 weeks...and have decided after driving the entire coast from Salinas> Puerto Lopaz, Monpiche, Esmeraldas, down through Santo Domingo through the Andes.. (That we are crazy!) And we have loved and hated and been amazed at so many things.... This is an adventure of epic proportions, and we have only met good people here. (With the exception of a guy in Guayaquil.). But that is another story! Come, enjoy, be open....bring Bourbon if you so desire or good tea, denture tablets and TOWELS! Enjoy your visit!
OH did any one ever tell you, it's always cold at night in these rooms, socks, housecoats or good ole Flannel P-J's Cheers

thread.title: (Görüntülü Haber) Prof. Dr. Nazlı: Helal gıda sertifikaları yeterli değil
thread.title_full: (Görüntülü Haber) Prof. Dr. Nazlı: Helal gıda sertifikaları yeterli değil

posts.title: (Görüntülü Haber) Prof. Dr. Nazlı: Helal gıda sertifikaları yeterli değil
posts.text:
Katalan lider Puigdemont teslim oldu (Görüntülü Haber) Prof. Dr. Nazlı: Helal gıda sertifikaları yeterli değil İSTANBUL, () - İSTANBUL Sabahattin Zaim Üniversitesi (İZÜ) Gıda Mühendisliği Bölüm Başkanı Prof. Dr. Bülent Nazlı, Müslümanların refahını, rahatını bozacak ürünleri tüketmek istememesinin gayet doğal hakları olduğunu belirterek... 
07 Kasım 2017 Salı 12:15 

İSTANBUL, () - İSTANBUL Sabahattin Zaim Üniversitesi (İZÜ) Gıda Mühendisliği Bölüm Başkanı Prof. Dr. Bülent Nazlı, Müslümanların refahını, rahatını bozacak ürünleri tüketmek istememesinin gayet doğal hakları olduğunu belirterek helal gıda sertifikalarının yeterli olmadığını söyledi. 

Helal gıdanın İslam koşullarına göre üretilen gıda olduğunu dile getiren Prof. Dr. Nazlı, "Müslüman insanlar yediklerinden rahatsız olmayacak.Yani refahını, rahatını bozacak ürünler tüketmeyecek. İnsanın bu hakkı doğaldır. İnsanın yeme içme fonksiyonu eğer bu kadar acilse,elzemse bunu rahat koşullarda yapmak istiyor. Mecbur olduğu koşullarda değil. Siz bunlara mecbur olduğu koşullar sunamazsınız. Onu seçimine sunmanız lazım. Dünyada yaklaşık 1, 8 milyar Müslüman yaşıyor, o yüzden helal gıda piyasası önem kazandı" dedi. 

"HELAL GIDA SERTİFİKALARI YETERLİ DEĞİL" 

Helal gıda sertifikalarının hepsine güvenilir ve yeterli demenin yanlış olduğunu aktaran Prof. Dr. Nazlı şöyle devam etti: 

" Ancak bu belgelerin güvenilir olması zorunlu. Bence bu belgeler yeterli de değil. Yani bir çok şey var helal gıdanın kendi içerisinde. Onun bir kaçını tamamlayıp da diğer bir kaçını tamamlayamıyorsak ,bu yeterli olmaz. Mesela domuz eti onu direkt tüketmek konusunu zaten herkes biliyor. O olsa ne olur olmasa ne olur. 

Ama domuz etinden yapılmış bir ürün hatta etinden ve kanından elde edilen bir kimyasal protein olabilir, kan olabilir bu eğer bir gıdanın içerisinde girmişse,acaba bunun denetlemesi nasıl oluyor? İznini nasıl yapıyorlar? Ve dolayısıyla bunun belgesini nasıl veriyorlar? Yani mesela benim en önem verdiğim konulardan biri biz Türkiye'de helal et diyoruz. Ne demek helal et? İslami koşullara göre kesilmiş hayvanlar; bunun içerisinde kesilme hududu var,hayvana davranma var, hayvanın gözü önünde başka hayvanı kesmeme var, besmele çekme var, kıbleye doğru hayvanı yatırmak var, yöneltmek var, kanını doğru akıtmak var, hijyene dikkat etmek var." 

"MEZBAHALARIMIZIN YARIDAN FAZLASI KÖTÜ DURUMDA" 

Mezbahaların yarısından fazlasının hijyen olarak kötü durumda olduğunu dile getiren Prof. Dr. Nazlı, "Mezbahalarımıza dönüp bakmak gerekir. Bu konuların hiç biri izlenmiyor, takip edilmiyor. O zaman o hayvanlarımız helal mi oluyor acaba? Bu tartışılır. O zaman o hayvanın eti o kadar geniş bir sahaya yayılıyor ki sucuklara, salamlara, kebaplara, hamburgerlere, dönerlere daha bir çok insana, binlerce milyonlarca insana gidiyor. O zaman biz helal et yemiyor muyuz? Yani bakın aksayan kısımlar bunlar. Bir işi doğru dürüst yapmamız lazım. Buna belge veren insanlarda bu işi takip etmeleri lazım. Ve bu işe de devletin sahip çıkması lazım. Bunların hepsi birlikte paralel bir şekilde geçmeli ve helal sertifikasyon kurumları da daha güvenilir halde olması için bunları daha detaylı bir şekilde incelemeli. Daha bilimsel ve metodolojik bir şekilde yaklaşmaları gerekir" diye konuştu. 

"HELAL AKREDİTASYON KURUMU'NUN KURULMASI GEREKİYORDU" 

Helal Akreditasyon Kurumu'nun gereklilik olduğunu ifade eden Prof. Dr. Nazlı, "Devletin bunu kurması şarttı. Akreditasyon ne demek bir şeyde güvenirliği arttırmak için bilgi donanımı demek ve bunun hayata geçirilmesi demek. Dolayısıyla da laboratuar akreditasyonu gerekiyor. Yani sınanmış bir şeyden geçiyor ki o bir güven telkin etsin. İnsanlar da ona güvensin, sonuçlarına da aynı şekilde. Yoksa yine mezbahalarda olduğu gibi biz kendi kendimizi kandırırız bu şekilde. Hayvan kesimlerinde de helal et mi değil mi? diye tartışır dururuz. Onun içinde bu akreditasyon olayları tabi ki önemli" dedi. 

"HELAL GIDA AYNI ZAMANDA SAĞLIKLI GIDADIR" 

Helal gıdanın aynı zamanda sağlıklı gıda olduğunu vurgulayan Prof. Dr. Nazlı, "Çünkü Müslümanlık dini hiç bir zaman insanlara zararı dokunacak bir gıdayı kabul etmez, satamazsın, tüketemezsin. Dolayısıyla insanlara bilgi vermek zorundasın, ikisi birbirinden ayrılmayacak bir parça. Yani normal gıda güvenliği koşulları ve bununla ilgili kanunlar ve helal gıda kanunları. Bunu özdeşleştirmek gerekiyor" ifadelerini kullandı.

thread.title: La Salle Greenies survive Red Cubs in triple OT
thread.title_full: La Salle Greenies survive Red Cubs in triple OT

posts.author: Delfin Dioquino
posts.title: La Salle Greenies survive Red Cubs in triple OT
posts.text:
La Salle Greenies survive Red Cubs in triple OT The LSGH-CSB's epic win books it a showdown against Mapua for the NCAA junior basketball crown Published 5:16 PM, November 07, 2017 Updated 5:16 PM, November 07, 2017 CLASSIC. The La Salle Greenies end San Beda's campaign for a 9th straight NCAA juniors finals appearance. 
MANILA, Philippines – The La Salle Greenies continue to surprise everybody. 
After toppling the San Sebastian Staglets in the playoff for the last Final Four slot, the Greenies squeaked past the top seed San Beda College Red Cubs, 110-108, in a classic triple overtime in the semifinals of the NCAA Season 93 on Tuesday, November 7 at the Mall of Asia Arena 
San Beda was on its way to its 9th straight finals appearance in the NCAA junior basketball as it held a 95-92 lead with only 11.8 seconds left in the second overtime. However, La Salle’s Joel Cagulangan knocked down a clutch triple from the top of the key with 4.2 seconds remaining to extend the game. 
Cagulangan scored 6 of his game-high 29 points in the third overtime period to lead the Greenies to their first championship appearance since 2013. He also had 9 rebounds, 9 assists and two steals in almost 52 minutes of play. 
Fatigue caught up with the Red Cubs as Ivan Nelle, who had a team-high 26 points to go with 11 rebounds and 8 assists, and Germy Mahinay, who produced 20 points and 17 boards, were sidelined in the dying minutes of the game due to cramps. 
Inand Fornillos had a monster double-double of 16 points, 18 rebounds and 4 blocks for the Greenies while Joshua Marcos added 15 markers and 14 boards. Joshua David chipped in 18 points. 
The Greenies committed 30 turnovers, 19 more than San Beda’s, but compensated it by having the edge in the rebounding (72-64) and blocks departments (9-3). 
La Salle will face the Mapua Red Robins in the best-of-three championship clash starting Friday, November 10, at the Araneta Coliseum. 
The Scores 
LSGH-CSB (110) – Cagulangan 29, David 18, Fornillos 16, Marcos 15, Morales 9, Mosqueda 8, Sangco 7, Perez 6, Lao 2, Cruz 0. 
SBC (108) – Nelle 26, Obenza 22, Mahinay 20, Velasquez 12, Etrata 10, Tagala 7, Abu Hijle 4, Sese 3, Alfaro 2, Nayve 2, Oliva 0.

posts.title: James Corden Highlights A Disturbing Trend In The Wake Of The Texas Church Shooting
posts.text:
ENTERTAINMENT 11/07/2017 03:37 am ET Updated 3 days ago James Corden Highlights A Disturbing Trend In The Wake Of The Texas Church Shooting “What can we say? Nothing." By Lee Moran 270 James Corden says Sunday’s mass shooting at a church in Sutherland Springs , Texas, revealed a worrying development.
On Monday’s “Late Late Show,” the host said he was stunned to hear a radio presenter classify the attack on the First Baptist Church as “the biggest U.S. mass shooting in a place of worship.”
“It amazed me that these mass shootings are so common in America that we now have a ranking system depending on the location of these tragedies,” said Corden. “What can we say? Nothing.”
Corden paid tribute to the 26 people killed and 20 wounded after Devin Kelley, 26, opened fire on the church. He also called on America’s leaders to “do something” about gun control.
Check out the full segment above.

posts.title: Global Toluene Market 2017-2021: Analysis By Derivative Type - Research and Markets
posts.text:
04:13 AM EST Global Toluene Market 2017-2021: Analysis By Derivative Type - Research and Markets 
The "Global Toluene Market 2017-2021" report has been added to Research and Markets' offering. 
The report forecasts the global toluene market to grow at a CAGR of 4.59% during the period 2017-2021. 
The report, Global Toluene market 2017-2021, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers the market landscape and its growth prospects over the coming years. The report also includes a discussion of the key vendors operating in this market. 
The latest trend gaining momentum in the market is the fluctuation in crude oil prices. Toluene is an aromatic compound that is used to manufacture benzene, TDI, and other derivatives. The key component used for manufacturing toluene is gasoline by the catalytic reformer in an ethylene cracker or while making coke from coal. Toluene is a distillate product of crude oil. Toluene is formed by the fractional distillation of crude oil. The fluctuating prices of crude oil affect the prices of the raw material, which affects the production cost of toluene. 
According to the report, one of the major drivers for this market is the widespread application avenues of toluene. Toluene is extensively consumed in TDI, which is used to manufacture flexible PU foams. These foams are used in upholstery, mattresses, and automotive seats. In addition, toluene as a solvent is used in paints, thinners, lacquers, glues, correction fluid, and nail polish remover. It is also used in the printing and leather tanning processes. In biochemistry, toluene is used for breaking or disrupting red blood cells to extract hemoglobin.

posts.title: Antigo internacional jovem pela Bélgica morre atingido por raio
posts.text:
Antigo internacional jovem pela Bélgica morre atingido por raio Denis Dasoul tinha 34 anos e já estava retirado dos relvados Redação 
Denis Dasoul, um antigo defesa que chegou a ser internacional jovem pela Bélgica, morreu no domingo passado ao ser atingido por um raio. 
O ex-jogador, de 34 anos, já estava retirado dos relvados e dedicava-se ao surf. Estava numa praia em Bali de Bali, Indonésia, quando foi atingido. 
Ao longo da carreira, Denis Dasoul representou profissionalmente clubes como Genk, Perugia, Antuérpia, entre outros. 
O Standard Liège, clube onde fez a formação, lamentou o desaparecimento trágico do antigo futebolista. Nous apprenons la disparition tragique de Denis Dasoul, formé au Standard de 1991 à 2001. Sincères condoléances à sa famille & ses proches 🌹 https://t.co/gzlacebJ4F — Standard de Liège (@Standard_RSCL) November 6, 2017

thread.title: O'Brien father-son show as Rekindling takes Melbourne Cup in Irish domination
thread.title_full: O'Brien father-son show as Rekindling takes Melbourne Cup in Irish domination

posts.title: O'Brien father-son show as Rekindling takes Melbourne Cup in Irish domination
posts.text: Play Video Both horses were wearing the navy silks of Lloyd Williams, whose obsession with the great race has now been translated into six Melbourne Cup triumphs, with the Willie Mullens-trained Max Dynamite 2½ lengths further back in third. That made it the first time the trifecta had all been trained in Europe. Further, they were all from Ireland. "I just want the post to come at that point," said Williams as he reflected on his two gallopers going at it in the straight. Advertisement Williams quinella: Rekindling (pink cap) crosses the line ahead of Johannes Vermeer to win the Melbourne Cup. It was the Irish through Dermot Weld and Vintage Crop in 1993 that had opened the Melbourne Cup to world. Now they are dominating it. Joseph O'Brien, a 24-year-old, looking more like a schoolboy than a Cup-winning trainer, stood amazed after the win. "I can't quite believe it," he said. "Nick Williams said he thought we were a good chance if he brought his form over here but you don't know until they get out there." This was his second group 1 win in a training career that is just two years old. As it was with his first group 1 win (2016 Moyglare Stud Stakes), Joseph had beaten his record-breaking father home. Aidan, who has more than 300 top-level successes, was straight on the phone. "I have already spoken to him," Joseph said. "The first thing he said to me was well done. He is over the moon, too. His horse ran a cracker and he was delighted." Lloyd Williams bought Rekindling as a yearling and raced him through his classic season. He was unplaced in the Derby before he beat the older horses in the Curragh Cup and ran an unlucky fourth in the English St Leger. "That is when we decided he might be the one to come out here," Williams said. "You can't put into words what doing this with a 24-year-old means to me and he is going to have a wonderful career but he will always be a Melbourne Cup-winning trainer. The three-year-olds have had the better of the older horses in Europe this year and he lived right up to that form." Rekindling races as a four-year-old in Australia, as did Adelaide when he won the Cox Plate in 2014, but in real terms he is the first three-year-old to win since Skipton in 1941. He got a brilliant ride from Corey Brown, saving ground from gate four and getting him ready to strike at the top of the straight. "Corey gave him an unbelievable ride," said O'Brien, who was a champion jockey in his own right. "Not often in a championship does it go that smoothly. He never got checked all the way. He got a great position on the rail and Corey saved all the ground. It was heck of ride." Brown, who returned from a Singapore sojourn for four years at the beginning of 2017, "couldn't quite put it into words". "Just everything went right," he said. "There was a scrimmage at the 1200m and Max Dynamite and me squeezed through on the fence. "We got to the top of the straight and travelled strongly. I thought, 'If you have got something, left we have a big chance'. He just let down but we had to chase the other one of Lloyd's but he was just too strong." Ben Melham had ridden Johannes Vermeer perfectly as well and dared to believe in the the final 200m. "He straightened up and I was mindful of going too early on him. I pushed the button and thought we were home. "The way he quickened I thought here we go, and he held that to the post. But in the end I think the weight difference probably got us." While Williams had the quinella, the ride on last year's winner Almandin from Frankie Dettori again left questions as he never got closer than three from the fence, finishing in 12th. Another Irish trainer, Mullins, had to be happy with minor money. He will be back again but he won't forget his 2017. He had to find a replacement rider for Thomas Hobson, after Joao Moreira fell early in the day and then watched the O'Briens race away from his game eight-year-old stayer, which was runner-up two years ago. Loading "He was terrific and any time you go home with a bit of money, you have to be happy," Mullins said. "He is an older horse and the younger legs were just a little fresh for him."

posts.author: osashimi03435858
posts.text:
レストランにより支払いが先か後かは異なります。
先なら一緒にいる状況なので、気にせず目の前で払えばいいですよ。
ちなみにネットで予約できる場合は予約しておいた方が安全です。当日「予約でいっぱいです」ってのは段取り悪過ぎてカッコ悪いです。
予約する事により良い席をキープしてもらえるケースが多いですよ。
ちなみに彼女のリクエストでブュッフェでしょうか？
楽しく好きなものを好きなだけ食べたいっていうなら良いのですが、テーブルサービススタイルビュッフェでないのならお話しする時間は少なくなってしまうかもしれないですよ。
価格的にファミリーは少なそう、ランチではなくディナーなのでオバちゃん集団もいなさそう…ビュッフェの中では良い選択かもしれないですね。
